channel.title: NPC + Player clipping
channel.description:
I'm trying to clip both the clippings for both Players and NPC, on my new source i'm working on. Since when you go to attack a NPC you walk threw walls/buildings. And then the NPC's themselves, can walk threw, as if there was no wall there. And I looked up on the forums[Here] to see if there was a guide, and now i'm looking to find help so that I can clip them both, so they don't walk threw walls. :) Any help would be nice...
Project Insanity[2007 RS remake]
